### Welcome to my webpage.

Personal Information

I was born and raised in Pune, a culturally rich town in Maharashtra, India. I received my Bachelors degree in Computer Application from University of Pune. After completing my Bachelor's education, I have done Masters degree from Pune University in Computer Application(MCA). I got first class in MCA. In my leisure time, I play badminton.
  After completing I have done OCJP certification. Currently I am learning Hadoop and looking forward for Cloudera certification CCDH.

```

    Hadoop Distributions: Cloudera CDH 3, Cloudera CDH4 , Hortonworks Sandbox 2.0
    Languages: C, C++, VB, Java
    Front End Web Development: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery
    Databases: Oracle, My-SQL, SQL Server. 
 
```
